DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample tumor tissue patient cancer laboratory may help doctor learn change occur DNA identify biomarkers related cancer . It may also help doctor predict whether cancer come back treatment . PURPOSE : This laboratory study identify gene may help predict recurrence woman breast cancer treat chemotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: Identifying Genes That Predict Recurrence Women With Breast Cancer Treated With Chemotherapy

OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Tissue sample examine association RNA expression clinical factor ( e.g. , tumor size , nodal status , hormone receptor status , age , menopause status ) , well estrogen receptor , progesterone receptor , HER-2/neu expression immunohistochemistry study . DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis breast cancer Node positive OR highrisk node negative disease Tumor > 1.0 cm diameter No locally advance , inflammatory , metastatic breast cancer Previously treat 4 course anthracyclinecontaining chemotherapy ( i.e. , doxorubicin docetaxel OR doxorubicin cyclophosphamide ) Enrolled clinical trial ECOGE2197 Adequate tumor material available ECOG Pathology Coordination Center Previously consent future cancerrelated research Hormone receptor status know PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Female Menopausal status specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
